mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (cmt_no, isbn, cmt_mbti, cmt_nickname, cmt_content, cmt_date, cmt_id) values(cmt_no.nextval, #{isbn}, #{cmt_mbti}, #{cmt_nickname}, #{cmt_content}, sysdate, #{cmt_id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where isbn =#{isbn}
mapper.update: update comments set CMT_CONTENT = #{cmt_content} where CMT_NO= #{cmt_no}
